choices.D: Use the DriverManager.getDriver method to load the driver class.
choices.B: Include the JDBC driver class in a jdbc.properties file.
choices.A: Add the driver class to the META-INF/services folder of the JAR file.
choices.C: Use the java.lang.Class.forName method to load the driver class.
